property.name: mdpc.descrs
property.value: Graphical gpdfx-ng tool to extract parts of a PDF.

project.property: Similar to `pdfscissors` this utility allows the user to select a portion of a PDF file. Unlike `pdfscissors`, however, this tool does not reduce all pages to the selected size but instead allows the user to extract a single selection to a new PDF file. This is handy for extracting graphics from multipage PDF files. . This version is gpdfx-ng as obtained from https://github.com/yishilin14/gpdf-ng
